import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import axios from "axios"; const Ordersum3 = () => { const [totalPrice, setTotalPrice] = useState(0); const [cartProducts, setCartProducts] = useState([]); const [productPrice, setProductPrice] = useState(0); const [couponDiscount, setCouponDiscount] = useState(0); const [couponCode, setCouponCode] = useState(""); const [orderId, setOrderId] = useState(""); const [shippingCharges, setShippingCharges] = useState(250); var username = localStorage.getItem("username"); var email = localStorage.getItem("email"); useEffect(() => { fetchData(); }, []); const fetchData = () => { var total = 0; var id = localStorage.getItem("id"); axios .get(`https://ariz.onrender.com/api/cart/cart/${id}`) .then((res) => { console.log(res.data); setCartProducts(res.data.cart); for (let i = 0; i < res.data.cart.length; i++) { total += parseInt(res.data.cart[i].price); } setProductPrice(total); // Set the initial product price setTotalPrice(total); const orderIdFromResponse = res.data.orderId; // Change 'orderId' to the actual property name setOrderId(orderIdFromResponse); }) .catch((err) => { console.log(err); }); }; return (

My Orders

{cartProducts && cartProducts.length > 0 ? ( cartProducts.map((cartProduct, index) => (

{cartProduct.productName}

Quantity : {" "} {cartProduct.quantity}

Size : {" "} {cartProduct.size}

Color : {" "} {cartProduct.color}

Rs. {cartProduct.price}

)) ) : (

Your cart is empty.

)}

Summary

Subtotal

{" "} Rs. {productPrice.toFixed(2)}

Discount{" "}

- Rs. {(productPrice - totalPrice).toFixed(2)}

Shipping

{" "} Rs. {shippingCharges.toFixed(2)}

Total

Rs. {(totalPrice + shippingCharges).toFixed(2)}

Shipping

Standard Delivery
Delivery with 2-5 days

â‚¹ 250

User

{username}

{email}

Shipping Address

); }; export default Ordersum3;
